Text: FERC Video Archives now available through the CapitolConnectionyou can access the archives of the Federal Energy Regulatory Commission FERC meetings via the internet using Real Player The Capitol Connection is offering this service for free for a limited time If you have not already registered and received the login name and password for the archives please go to and click on the FERC link on the sidebar Then click and complete the Archive Registration and you will receive your login name and password If you are interested in the Live or Archived meetings of the Federal Communications Commission FCC or National Transportation Safety Board NTSB please contact us If you have any questions concerning the FERC Video Archives please contact us at or at Thank you The Capitol Connection George Mason University Television PH
